title: Perform Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) on a Weld
description: A critical weld requires ultrasonic testing (UT) to check for internal defects.

tasks.description: Retrieve the ITP, which specifies that this weld requires 100% UT inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The NDT technician confirms the testing requirement.

tasks.description: Perform the ultrasonic test on the weld according to the approved procedure.
Analyze the UT results, which show no defects. Log the passing result and generate the NDT report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the scan data, finds it acceptable, and creates the formal NDT report.
